name: FuryDough
storyline:
Welcome to the wacky FuryDough world, where the real villains are... wait for it... CRAZY DONUTS!

Break through mazes, fight with a crowd of zany doughy adversaries, find and destroy Dough Mixers. This is not a sweet dream, but a real nightmare.

Gear up for:
The chaos of uniquely delicious procedurally generated levels
A Donut Demolisher Arsenal
Endless batches of crazed fights
summary: FuryDough is an action roguelite where donuts are everywhere, and you will hate them. Break through mazes, fight with a crowd of zany doughy adversaries, find and destroy Dough Mixers. This is not a sweet dream, but a real nightmare.
